title: Ranchitas Yummies Salad
ingredients: 2 cans of black beans (without the bean broth)
instructions: Step 1: Cook the beef alongside with the black beans, the green pepper and the corn kernels, as to have something similar to minced meat.
Step 2: Season as needed with pepper and garlic and cilantro marinade.
Step 3: Stop cooking and now prepare the salad.
Step 4: First add a layer of lettuce and tomato, then add the beef mix and Yummies" Cheese Nacho Ranchitas.
Step 5: Garnish with avocado, cream and cheese.
